Text:
Hi: Once you put a torrent up - then you have to stay on and become the seed for the Torrent..

All of your last 16 torrents as was stated by the person above have had no seeder - I cannot even pick you up with DHP after adding another 30 trackers.

Please put them in a folder and make a torrent and upload it again.. They sound like interesting comics - never saw them before..

Thanks
